text: [Ej muşrikon] Ojo oʙ dodan ʙa hoçijon va oʙod kardani Masçidu-l-haromro ʙo [imonu amali] kase, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va rūzi vopasin imon ovarda va dar rohi Alloh taolo çihod kardaast, ʙaroʙar medoned? [In du hargiz] Nazdi Alloh taolo ʙaroʙar nestand. Va Alloh taolo sitamgoron [-i muşrik]-ro hidojat namekunad
